pageContext.claim: “The globalist Koch Brothers, who have become a total joke in real Republican circles, are against Strong Borders and Powerful Trade. I never sought their support because I don’t need their money or bad ideas.”
pageContext.analysis: The Koch Brothers likely played an important role in Trump's 2016 election with their strong get-out-the-vote effort for Republican senate candidates in Northern and midwestern states. Moreover, Trump did seek the Koch Brothers support but was rejected, according to Politico.
